ygData.subject: Re: Unrest
ygData.msgSnippet: Im my opinion I think unrest is resonably safe to goto at lvl 14-16 WITH a large group and stick to yard kills and even hedge hunting(For Jacks) .. Also 16-19
ygData.messageBody:
Im my opinion I think unrest is resonably safe to goto at lvl 14-16 WITH a
large group and stick to yard kills and even hedge hunting(For Jacks) ..
Also 16-19 in groups (Unrest is very insistant or group play) stayingat the
side and pulling from the main floor of the house intelligently... at lvl 20
- 25 in groups second floor pulls and even Bar pulls if its NOT full.. 25
-30 anywhere you want and if in a large and very good group... Goto the
Basement :-) Thats where the fun starts... slow and steady...

Befallen is similar but lower lvl and if floor based... A lower lvl dung by
far but still a Paladin Shadow Knight Necro and cleric dream come true
withoutthe intensity of unrest.

Titianian Del'Silver
24th Order of Light
Relos Zek

>From: Michael Ott <mott@...>
>Reply-To: EQCheats@onelist.com

>Subject: Re: [EQCheats] Unrest

>

>
>what are good levels to go exploring befallen and unrest??
>
>-----Original Message-----
>From: Adrian Corey [mailto:doorman_sw@...]
>Sent: Thursday, July 01, 1999 8:54 AM
>To: EQCheats@onelist.com
>Subject: Re: [EQCheats] Unrest
>
>
>From: Adrian Corey <doorman_sw@...>
>
>
>
>
> >From: Doug Sorensen <belgarth_of_surefall@...>
> >Reply-To: EQCheats@onelist.com
> >To: EQCheats@onelist.com
> >Subject: Re: [EQCheats] Unrest
> >Date: Thu, 1 Jul 1999 10:54:39 -0700 (PDT)
> >
> >From: Doug Sorensen <belgarth_of_surefall@...>
> >
> >There are all kinds of good things in unrest.
>
>Bloodstained Mantle, Tunic and gloves. - Undead knight(Gloves are from the
>Ghoul Magi and are leather based NOT chain as the other 2 peices are)
>
>Savant's Cap or Dusty Blood stained Gloves - ghoul magi
> >Leather Apron (high AC belt) - undead barkeep
>Dwarven Work Boots - not sure, in the basement (Comes from the Dwarvin
>Ghost
>
>also has Jagged Bands ac 5 + 5 str rings)
>
>Ivory bracer? - animated hand(Ivory Bracelet not bracer)
>Tentacle whips - tentacle terrors(which are close to the dwarvin spirit)
> >Fine Steel weapons for selling - skels above dry and
> >carrion ghouls IIRC
> >Small bronze plate - dry bone skeletons
> >
> >that's a quick list off the top of my head.
> >
> >Belgarth Wolfstrider
> >
> >
> >--- Tim West <twest@...> wrote:
> > > From: "Tim West" <twest@...>
> > >
> > > Does anyone know what kind of loot can be found in
> > > the Estate Of Unrest and
> > > what MOBs this loot can be found off of ?
> > >
> > > Also, what is the best way to raise my faction
> > > standing with the Dwarves ?
> > > I am a Half-Elf and they want nothing to do with me.
> > > All of the people in
> > > the town look at me apprehensively.
> > >
> > > Tanaman
